bridge-type.label: Deutsche Bahn Timetable
bridge-type.description: Connection to the timetable API of Deutsche Bahn. Provides timetable data that can be displayed using the train things.

parameter.name: clientId
parameter.label: Client Id
parameter.description: Client ID from Application within DB API Marketplace for accessing the timetables webservice api.

parameter.name: clientSecret
parameter.label: Client Secret (API Key)
parameter.description: Client Secret (API Key) from Application within DB API Marketplace for accessing the timetables webservice api.

parameter.name: evaNo
parameter.label: EvaNo of Station
parameter.description: evaNo of the station, for which the timetable should be requested. see https://data.deutschebahn.com/dataset.tags.EVA-Nr..html

parameter.name: trainFilter
parameter.label: Train Filter
parameter.description: Selects the trains that will be displayed in this timetable. If not set only departures will be provided.

parameter.name: additionalFilter
parameter.label: Additional Filter
parameter.description: Specifies additional filters for trains, that should be displayed within the timetable.

thing-type.label: Train
thing-type.description: Displays information about a train within the given timetable at one station.

channel-group.label: Trip
channel-group.description: Contains all information about the trip of the train.

channel-group.label: Arrival
channel-group.description: Contains all information about the arrival of the train at the station. Channels may be empty, if the trains starts at this station.

channel-group.label: Departure
channel-group.description: Contains all information about the departure of the train at the station. Channels may be empty, if the trains ends at this station.

parameter.name: position
parameter.label: Position
parameter.description: Selects the position of the train in the timetable.

channel-group-type.label: Trip Attributes
channel-group-type.description: Contains all information about the trip of the train.

channel-group-type.label: Event Attributes
channel-group-type.description: Contains all attributes for an event (arrival / departure) of a train at the station.

channel-type.label: Category
channel-type.description: Provides the category of the trip, e.g. "ICE" or "RE".

channel-type.label: Number
channel-type.description: Provides the trip/train number, e.g. "4523".

channel-type.label: Filter Flags
channel-type.description: Provides the filter flags.

channel-type.label: Trip Type
channel-type.description: Provides the type of the trip.

channel-type.label: Owner
channel-type.description: Provides the owner of the train. A unique short-form and only intended to map a trip to specific evu (EisenbahnVerkehrsUnternehmen).

channel-type.label: Planned Platform
channel-type.description: Provides the planned platform of a train.

channel-type.label: Changed Platform
channel-type.description: Provides the changed platform of a train.

channel-type.label: Planned Time
channel-type.description: Provides the planned time of a train.

channel-type.label: Changed Time
channel-type.description: Provides the changed time of a train.

channel-type.label: Planned Status
channel-type.description: Provides the planned status of a train.

channel-type.label: Changed Status
channel-type.description: Provides the changed status of a train.

channel-type.label: Line
channel-type.description: The line indicator.

channel-type.label: Messages
channel-type.description: Messages for this train. Contains all translated codes from the messages of the selected train stop. Multiple messages will be separated with a single dash.

channel-type.label: Cancellation Time
channel-type.description: Time when the cancellation of this stop was created.

channel-type.label: Planned Path
channel-type.description: Provides the planned path of a train. For arrival, the path indicates the stations that come before the current station. The first element then is the trip’s start station. For departure, the path indicates the stations that come after the current station. The last element in the path then is the trip’s destination station. Note that the current station is never included in the path (neither for arrival nor for departure).

channel-type.label: Changed Path
channel-type.description: Provides the planned path of a train. For arrival, the path indicates the stations that come before the current station. The first element then is the trip’s start station. For departure, the path indicates the stations that come after the current station. The last element in the path then is the trip’s destination station. Note that the current station is never included in the path (neither for arrival nor for departure).

channel-type.label: Hidden
channel-type.description: On if the event should not be shown, because travellers are not supposed to enter or exit the train at this stop.

channel-type.label: Wings
channel-type.description: A sequence of trip id separated by the pipe symbols (“|”).

channel-type.label: Transition
channel-type.description: Trip id of the next or previous train of a shared train. At the start stop this references the previous trip, at the last stop it references the next trip.

channel-type.label: Planned Distant Endpoint
channel-type.description: Planned distant endpoint.

channel-type.label: Changed Distant Endpoint
channel-type.description: Changed distant endpoint.

channel-type.label: Distant Change
channel-type.description: distant change

channel-type.label: Planned Final Station
channel-type.description: Planned final station of the train. For arrivals the starting station is returned, for departures the target station is returned.

channel-type.label: Planned Intermediate Stations
channel-type.description: Returns the planned stations this train came from (for arrivals) or the stations this train will go to (for departures). Stations will be separated by single dash.

channel-type.label: Changed Final Station
channel-type.description: Changed final station of the train. For arrivals the starting station is returned, for departures the target station is returned.

channel-type.label: Changed Intermediate Stations
channel-type.description: Returns the changed stations this train came from (for arrivals) or the stations this train will go to (for departures). Stations will be separated by single dash.
